messages.details: dfdByteOffset is 103 but the Data Format Descriptor must immediately follow (with 4 byte alignment) the Level Index so it must be 104.

messages.message: Invalid dfdByteLength. If there is Key/Value Data the dfdByteLength/dfdTotalSize must be equal to kvdByteOffset - dfdByteOffset.
messages.details: dfdByteLength is 92 but it must be equal to kvdByteOffset - dfdByteOffset which is 93.
